ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Then afterwards We drowned the rest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And drowned the rest of them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Then after it, We drowned the rest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then We drowned the rest thereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then We drowned the rest afterwards
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: then afterwards We drowned the rest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then afterward We drowned the others.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then We drowned the rest thereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Thereafter We drowned those who remained behind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then We drowned the rest (disbelievers) thereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then We drowned thereafter the remaining ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:120] Then afterwards, after We delivered them, We drowned the rest, of his people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then afterward We drowned the others) i.e. the rest of his people, after Noah boarded the ship.
